featured.text: The movie director adapted this year’s bestseller into a hit and made a ______.
The famous film director Ang Lee recalls his father’s disappointment with him when he was young.
Arms extending horizontally commanded drivers to stop, whereas arms lowered to a 45-degree angle told drivers to move on, resembling a traffic director’s gestures.
The first traffic signal originated from the idea of a traffic director.

definition.zh_def: 導演；負責電影、戲劇或其他表演藝術作品的創作和製作的人。
definition.en_def: A person who is in charge of the creative aspects of a film, play, or other performance.
definition.example: The director gave clear instructions to the actors during rehearsal.
